mapper.sql: id, quotation_id, weight_lower, weight_upper, temperature_type_code, unit_price,continued_item, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, num_upper, num_lower, sku_upper, sku_lower, volume_upper, volume_lower, user_define1, user_define2, user_define3, user_define4, user_define5
mapper.insert: insert into price_storage_step (id, quotation_id, weight_lower, weight_upper, temperature_type_code, unit_price, continued_item, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, num_upper, num_lower, sku_upper, sku_lower, volume_upper, volume_lower, user_define1, user_define2, user_define3, user_define4, user_define5) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quotationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weightLower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{weightUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{continuedItem,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{numLower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{skuUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{skuLower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volumeUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volumeLower,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userDefine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefine2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userDefine3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefine4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefine5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update price_storage_step set weight_lower = #{weightLower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, weight_upper = #{weightUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, temperature_type_code = #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, continued_item = #{continuedItem,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modifier = #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, num_upper = #{numUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, num_lower = #{numLower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sku_upper = #{skuUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sku_lower = #{skuLower,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume_upper = #{volumeUpper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume_lower = #{volumeLower,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_define1 = #{userDefine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_define2 = #{userDefine2,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_define3 = #{userDefine3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_define4 = #{userDefine4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_define5 = #{userDefine5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id=#{id}
update price_storage_step set del_flag=1,last_modifier=#{lastModifier},last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime} where quotation_id=#{templateId} and del_flag=0
mapper.select: select ps.quotation_id, ps.weight_lower, ps.weight_upper, ps.temperature_type_code, ps.unit_price, ps.num_upper, ps.num_lower, ps.sku_upper, ps.sku_lower, ps.volume_upper, ps.volume_lower, ps.user_define1, ps.user_define2, ps.user_define3, ps.user_define4, ps.user_define5,ps.continued_item from price_storage_step ps, (SELECT pg.id from price_general_quotation pg LEFT JOIN price_contract_item pi on pi.template_id = pg.quotation_no LEFT JOIN price_contract_info con on con.contract_code = pi.contract_code where pi.contract_code = #{contractCode} and pi.subject_id = #{subjectId} and con.contract_state = '1' and pi.del_flag = 0 and pg.del_flag = 0 ) px where px.id = ps.quotation_id and ps.del_flag = 0

select ps.quotation_id, ps.weight_lower, ps.weight_upper, ps.temperature_type_code, ps.unit_price, ps.num_upper, ps.num_lower, ps.sku_upper, ps.sku_lower, ps.volume_upper, ps.volume_lower, ps.user_define1, ps.user_define2, ps.user_define3, ps.user_define4, ps.user_define5,ps.continued_item from price_storage_step ps left join price_general_quotation pg on pg.id = ps.quotation_id and ps.del_flag = 0 where pg.del_flag = 0 and pg.template_type = 'S'
and pg.subject_id= #{subjectId}
select * from price_storage_step where quotation_id=#{quotationId} and del_flag=0;
